text: Tomu, vyhlyadayutʹ patsiyent yak kur'yery pered tym, yak vy kotri ovolodily syloyu ta vdalysya do terpinnya. Ne pospishayuchy pobachyty retribution shcho inevitably prybudutʹ yim. Denʹ vony bachatʹ tse, tse bude zdavatysya tak, yakby vony vytrymaly odnu hodynu dnya. Tse ye proholoshennya: tse ne bezputnyy khto stiyko vynyshchuyutʹsya
